input: Subject: A futuristic spaceship interior; Characteristics: sleek control panels and holographic displays; Timing and lighting: artificial lighting with neon accents; Background: expansive cockpit window showing stars; Feeling: high-tech and exploratory.
output: Envision a futuristic spaceship interior characterized by sleek control panels and vibrant holographic displays, all illuminated by artificial lighting with striking neon accents that enhance the high-tech ambiance. The expansive cockpit window reveals a breathtaking view of distant stars twinkling in the vastness of space, capturing the essence of exploration and adventure. This scene evokes a sense of wonder and curiosity, immersing viewers in a world of advanced technology and the thrill of discovery beyond our planet.
